episode.title: 白い雪, 黒い服
White Snow, Black Clothes
Shiroi Yuki, Kuroi Fuku
episode.summary: On a snowstormy night, Alice is reminded of when she first began working as the Duke`s maid. Despondent and holed up in his dark, messy room, the Duke can`t even remember who Alice is and is ready to dismiss her. How will she get him to open his heart? Source: Funimation
